title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.10 - Class sa saline surface waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.10 - Class sa saline surface waters

State Regulations

The best usages of Class SA waters are shellfishing for
market purposes, primary and secondary contact recreation and fishing. These
waters shall be suitable for fish, shellfish and wildlife propagation and
survival. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
